item.description:
The sense of smell is just not enjoyed often enough. Experience a "perfume party" with light refreshments and then head out to dinner at the Green Land Cafe.

Akuura Kulak of Aroma Sanctum in Salem has over 20 years experience designing perfumes with natural ingredients. She began researching essential oils when she found she was highly allergic to most of the ingredients in commercial perfumes.Akuura specializes in creating custom fragrances for individual clients. $10 for the perfume party and dinner is dutch!!

If you don't want to pay via paypal, get in touch with me to pay by check or cash -- I need a deposit to hold the date. I'm not offering an official refund policy since the seating is limited and there is a cost to attend. Use paypal or send a check to Alchemy Enterprises PO Box 30 Nahant MA

group.name: Women Supporting Women Through Life's Incredible Journeys

item.name: Aroma Party in Salem (and dinner of course)
